universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Avoid generic centered layouts; use asymmetry.
Create depth with z-index and layered elements.
Do not center align the app container.
Add grain textures or noise overlays for premium feel.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: Follow the design system strictly. Use the provided image URLs. Implement the 'Bento' grid for the dashboard and 'Tetris' grid for marketing pages. Prioritize the 'Jewel & Luxury' aesthetic with the specified color palette. Use 'Unbounded' for all headings and 'Manrope' for body text. Ensure all charts use the 'recharts' library with the specified theme colors.
